name: Miamura: Synthesis Experiments Team!
description:
Introduction

Miamura is a tongue in cheek "science" based puzzle game in which you have to discover the right way to connect element nodes to create new compounds. Each puzzle has many solutions. 

Controls

[Q and E] to rotate the pieces.

[Y] to restart a puzzle.

[Space] to advance dialog. 

[K] to skip dialog.

The Story

An organisation creates compounds in a lab. For nefarious or good intentions who can say. One day happy go-lucky and always hungry (for knowledge and for desserts) Cadmia gets a trainee position working in the lab. From now on she will be mentored by the self serious (but secretly sensitive) Murasaki as they work on science experiments together.

GMTK 2021

The game has been produced in less than 48 hours for the GTMK GameJam 2021. All 3D renders, art, music, and code was created this weekend, nothing was reused. 

The Team

Pretty much all the coding, the Puzzle Design, Brainstorming: Zoey.

Interface Design, Creative Direction, Brainstorming, Script Writing, and a little code: Luna.

Character Design, Brainstorming, Music Composition: Annie.

Dev Notes:

-Some shapes need to be isolated for the level to complete (levels 1,2,3,7,8), shapes for levels 4 and 6 can have elements outside them but not inside.

-To beat level 5 (waterfall) you must fill the whole board in exactly 8 moves.

-A bug with level 2 allows you to complete it with excess elements attached to the goal.
